item.content:encoded:
In search of more LINE stickers to make your conversations more happy-going and friendly? Then look no more! Goodsmile Racing just released an official set featuring an adorable chibi Racing Miku 2019 as main character, and she’s absolutely perfect for such a role!

レーシングミク 2019Ver.のLINEスタンプが発売されました！ぜひぜひチェックをお願いいたします！ のこりの3戦でたくさん使ってくださいっ(み)https://t.co/B68PM9Cmr8
#fightgsr #初音ミク #レーシングミク pic.twitter.com/2vegq024RL

— GSR公式アカウント (@goodsmileracing) September 3, 2019

40 cutesy stickers, illustrated by Annindoufu, are waiting for you and your LINE messenger for only 1,99 USD, just click here and adopt her as your next emoji mascot!

It seems that those stickers might not be available in certain countries, so be aware you might be unable to buy this set!

Stay tuned with us on VNN and don’t forget to support Goodsmile Racing and their Hatsune Miku GT Project with us!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo.
You can find Goodsmile Racing on Twitter, Instagram, their blog and of course the official website!

The post Official Racing Miku 2019 LINE Stickers Now Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure feat. Annindoufu Preorders Now Open
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The Racing Miku 2019 ver. 1/8 scale figure feat. Annindoufu is now open for preorder! She’s now available from Good Smile Company’s online shop, and various online stores! A scale figure of the official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project! The official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project, Racing Miku 2019 Ver. …

The post Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure feat. Annindoufu Preorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Racing Miku 2019 ver. 1/8 scale figure feat. Annindoufu is now open for preorder! She’s now available from Good Smile Company’s online shop, and various online stores!

A scale figure of the official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project!

The official character of the 2019 Hatsune Miku GT Project, Racing Miku 2019 Ver. feat. Annindoufu, is now a 1/8th scale figure! The original 2019 Racing Miku illustration by Annindoufu has been carefully brought to life in eye-popping detail.

The various frills and details of her idol-themed outfit have been faithfully recreated. Translucent parts have been used to recreate her hair, giving her hair a somewhat see-through appearance at the tips. Be sure to add her to your collection!

*This product is a GSR coupon item.
https://www.goodsmileracing.com/sponsors/coupon/?language=en

Preorders are now open on Good Smile Online’s shop at 15,800 yen ($151 USD) until September 5th at 12:00 PM JST, with an expected ship date in January 2021. She’s also available from these other online shops listed below!

Check back in a few hours for pending inks!
> Tokyo Otaku Mode (Supports MikuFan!)
> CDJapan (Supports MikuFan!)
> Good Smile Company
> Amiami
> Hobby Search
> Nippon Yasan
> Hobby Link Japan

Product Page
https://www.goodsmile.info/en/product/8643/

Check out the review by Kahotan from Good Smile Company!
https://mikatan.goodsmile.info/en/2019/08/02/racing-miku-2019-ver-feat-annindoufu/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure feat. Annindoufu Preorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.

The post GSC’s Kahotan Reviews Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure, Preorders Open August 6th appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The latest blog update from Good Smile Company’s figure reviewer and blogger “Kahotan” is a spotlight on our favorite idol-themed Racing Miku 2019 ver. 1/8 scale figure! Based on the visual by Annin Oiko, she has been carefully brought to life with expert craftsmanship and thorough attention to details, from her partially translucent twintails to her skin-tight boots.

Preorders will open on GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP from August 6th. Be sure to keep an eye out for her on Good Smile Company official site, or on other various online stores available!

Check out the full review and gallery on Kahotan’s blog!
https://mikatan.goodsmile.info/en/2019/08/02/racing-miku-2019-ver-feat-annindoufu/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post GSC’s Kahotan Reviews Racing Miku 2019 Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure, Preorders Open August 6th appeared first on VNN.

item.title: In Full Speed With More Racing Miku Merchandise!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
No matter in what period of the year we are in, it’s always time for more Racing Miku merchandise! Isn’t it? COCOLLABO Brings us an Acrylic Stand and a Parka! Let’s begin with COCOLLABO‘s new items themed after our current Hatsune Miku GT Project mascot from Goodsmile Racing: Racing Miku 2019! Today, they have added …

The post In Full Speed With More Racing Miku Merchandise! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
No matter in what period of the year we are in, it’s always time for more Racing Miku merchandise! Isn’t it?

COCOLLABO Brings us an Acrylic Stand and a Parka!

Let’s begin with COCOLLABO‘s new items themed after our current Hatsune Miku GT Project mascot from Goodsmile Racing: Racing Miku 2019! Today, they have added two new different items to their online shop, a big acrylic stand and a comfy parka! Check them out below!

Racing Miku 2019 Thailand Ver. Big Acrylic Stand

This marvelous acrylic stands is bigger than average. It is about 200mm of height and features our beloved Racing Miku 2019 in her Thailand support attire!

Size is W230xH200xD5mm, with the base having a diameter of 130mm! Its price is 3,240 JPY and will be released on early September!

Want to pre-order this item? Then click here to reach its product page!

Racing Miku 209 Full Graphic Parka

Nothing shows your support for a team more than wearing their mascot everyday, isn’t it? I bet this Racing Miku 2019 Full Graphic Parka will look great in your wardrobe then!

Available in three different sizes (M/L/XL) and being made in polyester, this Parka sure doesn’t fail in showing Racing Miku 2019’s charm and enthusiasm!

It is priced 9,720 JPY and will be delivered on early September, just like the previous item!

You can pre-order it by clicking here!

POP UP PARADE Racing Miku 2010 Now up for Pre-order!

Next we have the much awaited POP UP PARADE figure of Racing Miku 2010 from Good Smile Company! It will finally be available for pre-order through their online store!

Miku from the 2010 Hatsune Miku GT Project!

“The fifth figure in the POP UP PARADE series is Racing Miku 2010 Ver. from the 2010 Racing Miku GT Project! Illustrator redjuice‘s mechanic style design has been faithfully recreated, including Miku’s unique heels, her tools and her adorable smile. The figure has been painted to accurately reflect the different textures each material, making for a truly stunning appearance.”

She’s approximately 170mm in height and is priced 3,900 JPY, a real deal for fans in search for high quality figures at an affordable price!

You can find and pre-order her here until July 11th at 12PM (JST)! She’s scheduled for release on October 2019!

Hatsune Miku GT Project Exhibition Period Extended!

Last but not least, we have some great news for fans that are currently in Japan: Hatsune Miku GT Project’s exhibition period got extended to June 22nd!

《初音ミク GTプロジェクト展 》ではオンラインショップの人気商品を直接手に取ってお買い求め頂けます。本日バスタオル【黒】も再入荷致しました！遠方の方はオンラインショップへどうぞ♪
期間 6/22(土)まで会期延長
平日 15:00-19:00
土日 11:00-19:00
場所 アキバCOギャラリー pic.twitter.com/AzxiLrB6cD

— チーム右京オンラインショップ (@teamukyo_shop) June 13, 2019

Location is Akiba CO Gallery. It’s open on weekdays on 3PM until 7PM, and on 11AM to 7PM during weekends!

This is your chance to grab some merchandise!

Sources

Stay tuned with us on VNN and don’t forget to support Goodsmile Racing and their Hatsune Miku GT Project with us!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo
Don’t forget to check Good Smile Company’s POP UP PARADE product line up page as well!
COCOLLABO is on Twitter as well, and has an official website featuring an entire category filled with Racing Miku 2019 merchandise!

The post In Full Speed With More Racing Miku Merchandise! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Racing Miku 2018 Thailand Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Prorders Now Open
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
If you’re a fan of Thailand version Racing Miku, you’ll be happy to hear that the 2018 version scale figure by FREEing has appeared for preorder just a week after the 2017 version! Presenting the 2018 Thailand Support Ver. Of Racing Miku from the Hatsune Miku GT Project! The 2018 Thailand Support Ver. Of Racing Miku …

The post Racing Miku 2018 Thailand Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Prorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you’re a fan of Thailand version Racing Miku, you’ll be happy to hear that the 2018 version scale figure by FREEing has appeared for preorder just a week after the 2017 version!

Presenting the 2018 Thailand Support Ver. Of Racing Miku from the Hatsune Miku GT Project!

The 2018 Thailand Support Ver. Of Racing Miku 2018 from the Hatsune Miku GT Project is now a scale figure! Based on the design by illustrator Hiro Kanzaki, the energetic Racing Miku has been brought to life. Her costume and tanned skin are unique features of the Thailand Support Ver. Parts of her costume, sunglasses and her twintails have been recreated with translucent parts. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Racing Miku 2018 Thailand ver. is now available for preorder from Good Smile Company’s online shop for 15,400 JPY ($140 USD), and will be open for preorder until June 13th, 2019 with an expected ship date of October 2019. She’s also available from these other online shops!

Tokyo Otaku Mode (Supports MikuFan!)
> CDJapan (Supports MikuFan!)
> Hobby Link Japan (Supports MikuFan!)
> Good Smile Company
> Amiami
> Hobby Search
> Nippon Yasan (Pending)

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Racing Miku 2018 Thailand Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Prorders Now Open appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Good Smile Company’s “Snow Miku Time” livestream event has finished, and has a lot of exciting news to share! If you missed the live stream event, you can rewatch the YouTube recording for as long as it’s available. Let’s get started on the announcements! Even though it was the last part of the live stream, the reveal …

The post Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Company’s “Snow Miku Time” livestream event has finished, and has a lot of exciting news to share! If you missed the live stream event, you can rewatch the YouTube recording for as long as it’s available. Let’s get started on the announcements!

Even though it was the last part of the live stream, the reveal of the Snow Miku and Yukine 2020 design finalists is what everyone was waiting for! Here’s the list of the 6 finalists:

#1: “Grand Piano” by 杏夏蜜柑 → https://piapro.jp/t/saxQ
#2: “Taiko” by こり → https://piapro.jp/t/YxrR
#3: “Horn” by メープル → https://piapro.jp/t/HnGM
#4: “Accordion” by mgr → https://piapro.jp/t/sWBP
#5: “Flute” by 二六時中 → https://piapro.jp/t/lO2m
#6: “Marching Band” by ππ → https://piapro.jp/t/P9Kf

Community voting will be counted until May 17th, JST. Only one vote per person/device will be counted! The winning design will be announced at Magical Mirai 2019.

-> CLICK HERE TO VOTE! <-
Magical Mirai 2019

A new piece of artwork showing off Magical Mirai 2019 themed outfits for Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO and MEIKO were revealed during the livestream. Expect these designs to play part in decorations and goods for Magical Mirai 2019!

The Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 ver. was also announced during the stream! Details regarding pricing and release date were not yet announced, but we can expect to hear more soon.

Racing Miku 2019

Good Smile Company announced a 1/8 scale figure for Racing Miku 2018, based on the art design by Annin Oiko! There’s only a prototype sculpture being teased for now. Expect a painted version to be revealed, along with pricing and release info at a later date.

Good Smile Racing and Nitroplus are collaborating together again this year with Racing Miku and Super Sonico. Two new artworks by Minoa and 津路参汰 were released as part of this collaboration. Other details of the collaboration will come at a later time.

Other Goods & Collabs

A scale figure of Hatsune Miku Symphony 2018~2019 will be made! The figure will be based on the original artwork by Rella. Other details are not yet available, so keep watching for that.

Also, a Hatsune Miku x Macaron collaboration was announced, which will make special Cryptonloid themed Macaroons available, along with an A2 size visual poster!

Lastly, SEGA announced the availability and release dates for the following prize plushies and figures: Hatsune Miku: White Dress ver. plushie (releases 3rd week of May 2019), Hatsune Miku: White Dress ver. premium figure (releases 4th week of May 2019), a new trio of Hatsune Miku keychain plushies (releases 3rd week of June 2019) and Mega Jumbo Fuwafuwa ver. Sakura Miku plushie (on preorder at Chara-Ani until May 28th).

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary appeared first on VNN.

item.title: FREEing’s Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Ver. Figure up for Pre-order Starting From May 8th!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
What could make our month of May better than Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Version’s figure being up for pre-order very soon? Yes, our favorite racing fairy makes a comeback once again giving us a spark of tropical atmosphere! Let’s give her a look together! A Tanned Beauty for Your Needs! Probably one of the most …

The post FREEing’s Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Ver. Figure up for Pre-order Starting From May 8th! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
What could make our month of May better than Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Version’s figure being up for pre-order very soon? Yes, our favorite racing fairy makes a comeback once again giving us a spark of tropical atmosphere! Let’s give her a look together!

A Tanned Beauty for Your Needs!

Probably one of the most popular and loved versions of Racing Miku was the one designed by Tony Taka back in 2017. This fairy Miku used to cheer for GSR’s team flawlessly and, as you might remember, she also had a Thailand version, which is now going to become a marvelous 1/1 scale figure to be released on November!

With such a tropical feeling accompanied by her gentle pose and her sophisticate tanned skin, this Racing Miku will be perfect to give some fresh air to your collection her hair also use a special clear-like type of parts, giving them an even more soft coloration. There is no way you would miss this release!

This figure’s prototype was made by Design COCO and will be priced 17,000 JPY (tax excluded). She will be up for pre-order via Good Smile Company’s online store starting from tomorrow until June 6th, so you might want to be fast if you want to grab her!  Fairies can easily escape from humans after all, right?

Sources

While we wait for this awesome figure to be released and please our collectors’ heart content, we can admire her from the photos that GSR shared with us via their official blog!

Don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for all the news about your favorite Virtual Singers!

Goodsmile Racing on Facebook and Twitter (Japanese only)
FREEing on Twitter
Goodsmile Racing Official Blog Post

The post FREEing’s Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Ver. Figure up for Pre-order Starting From May 8th! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Racing Miku 2019: Thailand Cheer ver. Design Revealed
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
During last night’s news stream by Goodsmile Racing, the design for this year’s Thailand Cheer version of Racing Miku 2019 was announced! The design by @Annin_Oiko features Racing Miku with the usual tanned look, along with a sailor-outfit inspired 2 piece bikini and umbrella. She’s absolutely cute! This design will be featured in upcoming merchandise, as well …

The post Racing Miku 2019: Thailand Cheer ver. Design Revealed appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
During last night’s news stream by Goodsmile Racing, the design for this year’s Thailand Cheer version of Racing Miku 2019 was announced! The design by @Annin_Oiko features Racing Miku with the usual tanned look, along with a sailor-outfit inspired 2 piece bikini and umbrella. She’s absolutely cute!

This design will be featured in upcoming merchandise, as well as at this year’s Round 4 race in Thailand for the SUPER GT 2019 competition. A figure is also likely to be announced sometime later, so stay tuned for those updates!

Trivia: Thailand version Racing Miku has been a reoccurring idea since the first design in 2014.

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Racing Miku 2019: Thailand Cheer ver. Design Revealed appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku GT Project 2019 Theme Song Contest Winners Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
You may remember the Hatsune Miku GT Project 2019 theme song contest that got announced in late February of this year, aiming in recruiting a very special theme song for the current Racing Miku. They finally announced the contest’s results and those are quite surprising too! One Idol, Ten Songs! This contest’s theme revolved all …

The post Hatsune Miku GT Project 2019 Theme Song Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
You may remember the Hatsune Miku GT Project 2019 theme song contest that got announced in late February of this year, aiming in recruiting a very special theme song for the current Racing Miku. They finally announced the contest’s results and those are quite surprising too!

One Idol, Ten Songs!

This contest’s theme revolved all around “Idol”, as Racing Miku 2019 follow this very specific theme. They expected to only have one recruited song, however, there were so many good submissions that they couldn’t simply decide. As a result, this little cute idol will have ten different songs representing her and her cause! You can find them below!

  • Go Forward by Haltak at satellites
  • Gallop by GK_GEaR
  • Shift up! by yui-to
  • Racing Fantasista by tsukamon_27
  • OVER THE RAINBOW by ARiKEM
  • Spring by imie
  • FULL DRIVE M-TUNE by yuhi(slowmotion)
  • Traction Control! by COWshi
  • Winning Star by Yukisei (GINnNO)
  • Kimi Iro no STAGE de by Takadashi

What do you think of the winning entries?  We absolutely and cannot wait to see them shining for our beloved racing idol!

Remember to stay tuned with us on VNN for all the news and updates about your favorite Virtual Singers!

Piapro Blog Press Release
Goodsmile Racing Blog Post
Goodsmile Racing on Twitter
Contest Official Page

The post Hatsune Miku GT Project 2019 Theme Song Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Review
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
With Racing Miku 2018 taking center stage this year and her Nendoroid already being up for pre-order, Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 is retiring. However, that doesn’t mean she’s gone yet! There are still a few Racing Miku 2017 Nendoroid to grab over on Tokyo Otaku Mode as well as other figure websites. And considering how …

The post Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Review appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With Racing Miku 2018 taking center stage this year and her Nendoroid already being up for pre-order, Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 is retiring. However, that doesn’t mean she’s gone yet! There are still a few Racing Miku 2017 Nendoroid to grab over on Tokyo Otaku Mode as well as other figure websites. And considering how adorable she is, she’s definitely a must-have! I (Hoshi) have a full review of the figure!

Note: While this article isn’t sponsored, VNN uses affiliate links and gains a small commission from purchases.

First Impressions

I knew that I wanted this Nendoroid the moment I saw the Racing Miku 2017 design, honestly. She was absolutely adorable and just pure perfection. And the Nendoroid definitely doesn’t disappoint. Right out of the box, she’s super cute. She’s honestly one of the cutest Miku figures that I have in my ever growing collection!

Accessories

Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 comes with about the standard amount of accessories for a Nendoroid: Two face plates, a leg bent at the knee, various arm parts, a few extra hands, a trophy (congrats on winning the 2017 SUPERGT Championship!), and a bouquet of flowers. In addition, she also has a nice little race car! The car comes without decals, so prepare to put them on yourself. I’m personally too much of a perfectionist and haven’t tried my hand at the decals yet.

The Car

To fit Miku in the car, just remove her lower half and stick her upper body in the car on the peg provided. She comes with a steering wheel and arms and hands to hold the wheel. Just be careful of what angles you photograph her from! The wheel isn’t connected to the car, so you have to make sure she’s photographed from an angle that doesn’t show this. Unless you’re going for a comedy shot, of course.

The Figure

As mentioned earlier, the figure is adorable. And thanks to her wings, she doesn’t even need a Nendoroid stand! (Which worked out great for me since my stand came missing a part.*) The Nendo itself feels very high quality and overall doesn’t have any glaring issues whatsoever. Her one arm is slightly loose as is her lower body at times, but it was nothing that couldn’t be worked around.

*Note that if you contact GSC about a product that you bought from them or a partner shop, you’ll likely receive a replacement part for anything that came broken. However, they use Registered SAL to ship the parts, and SAL is currently a little bit slower than usual, so the part may take a few weeks to arrive.

Details

It seems like every little detail from the original illustration was preserved in this tiny little chibi! The circuit board design of the wings is so crisp and clear it’s absolutely amazing. All of the logos for GSR and their sponsors are also perfect. And the sculpting and painting for Miku’s hair and accessories is astounding! Each flower looks to be carefully sculpted and the gradient in her hair is just beautiful. Her headphones look just as superb as well. I’m usually the first to find faults with a Nendoroid, but this one doesn’t have many.

The only thing I’d complain about is her skirt and the green ruffles of her shirt. They’re this kind of transparent-but-not type of material that can look incredibly odd in certain lighting. While a light box setup fixes these issues, natural lighting doesn’t always compliment the material.

Bonuses!

Tokyo Otaku Mode is selling the Personal Sponsorship versions of the Nendoroid and figma, so you get bonuses with them as well! I personally bought the 8,000 yen version because I didn’t need all the stuff that comes with the 15,000 yen version. Both come with a Personal Sponsor Card, a Ticket Holder, the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver., the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Keychain Vol. 1, and the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Keychain Vol. 2. The 15,000 yen version comes with a hand towel and mini pouch as well.

In addition to their intended purpose, the acrylic keychains can be used as decoration as well! They come with little stands that you can place the keychain in so that it can stand up on its own.

Final Thoughts

She’s cute. You need her. In all seriousness, though, she’s definitely a product that I would recommend! Grab her before she’s gone for good!

Where to Buy

You can grab both of the Sponsorship Courses from Tokyo Otaku Mode!

8,000 yen Course: $108.99 USD or $89.37 USD with Premium (Note: Only ten are left as of when this article was written!)

15,000 yen Course: $203.99 USD or $173.39 USD with Premium

Sign up for TOM Premium for an extra $10 off your purchase as well!

And while you’re at it, be sure to grab the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2018 as well! If you’re not interested in sponsoring GSR (which you really should look into doing if you can!), you can order the standard edition at the links below.

TOM | CD Japan | AmiAmi | GSC

The post Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Review appeared first on VNN.
